channel.title: Help with coding
channel.description: hi guys, i was wondering, how do i choose what the shops sell or were the shop chars are, i alsoknow how to put item spawns in but not were to put them in the script any help??

item.title: Help with coding
item.dc:creator: @_Sunkist _Sunkist_
item.description:
@_Sunkist wrote:

To change what the shops sell open up Shops.cfg, search the name of the shop you want to modify (with underscores not spaces)

You’ll see something like this:

shop = 4 Cassie's_Shield_Shop 2 2 1171 5 1173 4 1189 3 1175 2 1191 2 1177 0 1193 0

dont change the "shop = #

also dont change the first two “2”'s

The “cassie’s shield shop” is the name of the shop (dont use spaces)

the "1171, 1173, 1189, 1175, 1191 1177, and 1193 are the ID’s of the items (change these to the item you want :))

the other numbers are how many of each item are in the shop

Its kinda confusing the way i put it but yeah…hope it helps some

And to change the location of the shop change where the npc is in autospawn

Read full topic
